snippet: As the nation marks the anniversary of the 2011 quake and tsunami, an undertaker who cared for nearly 1,000 corpses using Buddhist rituals is lauded as a hero.
abstract: Atsushi Chiba, an undertaker who cared for nearly 1,000 corpses using Buddhist rituals, is lauded as a hero as Japan marks the anniversary of the 2011 quake and tsunami,
lead_paragraph: As the nation marks the anniversary of the 2011 quake and tsunami, an undertaker who cared for nearly 1,000 corpses using Buddhist rituals is lauded as a hero.

headline.seo: A Year Later, Undertaker’s Story Offers Japan Hope
headline.main: Japan Finds Story of Hope in Undertaker Who Offered Calm Amid Disaster
headline.print_headline: Japan Finds Story of Hope in Undertaker Who Offered Calm Amid Disaster
